page.title: 05Girls' Fashion
page.content:
Most of my friends wear fashionable clothes. The "in" colours are pastels, white, black and red. Ski-pants are in fashion, they are like tights but with a piece of material under the foot. Lightweight jeans, very baggy and rolled up just above the ankle are also in fashion. Another fashionable piece of clothing is a white jacket (not a zip up jacket) this should be very baggy.
During the winter suede coats were very fashionable but not many people had them because they were very expensive.
The fashionable things to wear in your hair are brightly coloured hair-grips with flowers or butterflys on them. Every one dyes or streaks their hair, streaks are most popular.
